full_summary:
**Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) - Armored Tubing**
================================================ї

**Reference Number**
------------------
WS4326989903-Doc4363194961

**Publication Date**
-------------------
December 21, 2023

**Tender Closure Date**
---------------------
January 8, 2024, 2:00 pm EST

**Procurement Information**
---------------------------

### Notice Type
This tender announcement serves as an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for the establishment of a National Individual Standing Offer (NISO) for Armored Tubing.

### Procurement Method
The procurement method employed for this tender is competitive, with open bidding.

### Contract Award
The resulting Standing Offer will be awarded to Cargo Lift USA, pending no compliant Statements of Capability being received. If compliant Statements of Capability are received, a competitive procurement process will proceed.

### Standing Offer Term
The resulting Standing Offer will have a term of one firm year and four optional years.

### Applicable Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

### Regions of Delivery
The deliverables for this contract will be supplied to the following regions:

* Canada
* Gatineau

### Contracting Entity
The contracting entity for this tender is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), represented by Potvin, Stéphane (SPAC/PSPC).

### Contract Enquiry
Interested contractors are requested to submit their Statements of Capability in accordance with the bid submission guidelines. A debriefing on the results of the ACAN process may be requested by those who have submitted a Statement of Capability. 

[Proposal reference link will be included here, if required.]

---

Do you need me to adopt the text to another format ?  I'd be happy to do so.
